rukus.text: hananim-eun neohuileul wihae daeji leul yuyeonhage hasyeossnani gosgos-eul da nyeo bola geuligo geubun-i bepun yangsig eul seobchwihala jug-eun hueneun geubunkke lo gwiuihanola
haneul-e gyesin geubunkkeseo daeji leul heundeul-eo geugeos-i neohuileul samkyeo beo lijineun moshage hal geos-ila ansimha neunyo
animyeon haneul-e gyesin geubunkke seo neohui wie eungbeol-eul naeliji ani hal geos-ila ansimhaneunyo geuttae neohui neun naui eungbeol-i eotteohan geos-ingaleul alge doelila
sillo geudeul ijeon baegseongdeul-i naui gyeong-goleul geoyeoghaess-eul ttae geudeul wie naelyeojin naui beol-i eolmana museowoss deonyo

meoli wieseo saedeul-i nalgaeleul pyeossdaga jeob-eossda hamyeonseo meog-ileul chae lyeogo deopchineun saedeul-eul boji moshaessdeo nyo jabilousin hananim oeeneun eo neu nugudo geuleohge yujihal su eobsnani sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesim-ila
jabilousin hananim oee neo huileul doul ju-in-eun nugu-inyo sillo bulsinjadeul-eun hwansang-e ppajyeo issdeola
hananim-i yangsig-eul geodusindamyeonneohuiege nuga neohuiege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jugessneunyo geuleondedo geudeul-eunjinlieseo beos-eona omanhadoda
gogae sug-yeo geodneun jaga nasgess neunyo animyeon baleun gil-eul geodneunjaui indodoem-i nasgessneunyo

illeogalodoe neohuileul changjohasaseongjangke hago deudneun neunglyeoggwa boneun neunglyeoggwa gamgag-ui neunglyeoglwa ihaeui neunglyeog eul jusin bun-i balo hananim-isila geuleona neohuineun gamsahaji anhdeola
illeogalodoe daeji wie neohui leul beonseongke hasin bun-i hananim-isi geoneul neohui moduga geubunkkelo jibhab doenola
geuleona geudeul-eun geudaega jinsil eul malhago iss-eul ttae i yagsog-i eon je silhaengdoeneunyo lago mul-eumae
illeogalodoe geugeos-eun hananim man-i asineun geos-eulo sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja-e bulgwahanila

geuleona geudeul-i geugeos-eul gakka iseo moggyeoghal ttaemyeon bulsinjadeul-ui eol gul-eun seulpeum-eulo gadeugchal geos-imyeo geu geos-i neohuiga guhadeon ihaengdoel yagsog iyo laneun malsseum-i deullyeool geos-ila

illeogalodoe nawa geuligo na wa hamkke han jadeul-eul hananimkkeseo myeolmangke hasigeona animyeon uliege eunhyeleul bepunda hadeolado gotongseuleoun eungbeollobuteo bulsinjadeul-eul nuga gujehal su iss-eulleonji neohuiga saeng-gag hae boassneunyo
illeogalodoe geubun-eun jabilousin bun-eulo ulineun geubunman-eul mid-eu myeo geubun-egeman uitaghanani neohuineunbunmyeonghi banghwanghaessdeon jaga nugu-inji alge doelila
illeogalodoe mul-i ttangsog-eulo seumyeodeul-eo mul-eul ilhge doeeoss-eul ttae nuga neohuiege heuleuneun mul-eul gong-geubha yeo jugessneunyo
